name: Get Inventory Statuses

query_params.name: page
query_params.summary: Which page of results to return

query_params.name: per_page
query_params.summary: The number of results returned per page. Defaults to 25

query_params.name: order
query_params.summary: Provide a field name to change the sort order. Defaults to created_at

query_params.name: direction
query_params.summary: Accepts asc or desc. Defaults to desc

notes: An inventory status that is assigned to a unit (inventory) either manually, or automatically when a reservation/contract is written.

notes_blocks.text: An inventory status that is assigned to a unit (inventory) either manually, or automatically when a reservation/contract is written.

runs.text: An inventory status that is assigned to a unit (inventory) either manually, or automatically when a reservation/contract is written.
